descriptions.overview: The Greenway collection is the perfect solution for every patio and will make your backyard the center of activity. This collection combines luxury, beauty, comfort at an affordable price. The Greenway 5-Pc Sectional Set sits up to 5 people. Included are 4 armless slipper chairs and 1 corner chair all fully assembled. Being modular, there are lots of different combinations you can arrange the seats to suit your entertaining space. This collection also features additional slipper chairs (Item 1312439), matching ottoman (Item 950218), chaise lounge chair (Item 950216), coffee table (Item 950217) and an end table (Item 950219). The Greenway collection is constructed with high quality, brown, resin wicker with rust-resistant matte brown powder-coated steel frames. The tan cushions are made from olefin with a durable poly foam core that provide seasons of comfortable seating.
list: Hand-woven all-weather wicker back adds visual appeal
Each tan cushion is made with premium olefin fabric treated to resist moisture, staining and fading
Coordinate the Greenway Slipper Chairs, Ottoman, Coffee Table, End Table or Chaise to create the perfect seating arrangement
Crafted by hand using a heavy-duty steel frame, these chairs also feature a weather and rust-resistant brown double powder-coating to further protect from the elements
Sectional design can be configured together or separately to accommodate your group needs
Convenient connector plates attach to the front feet of each chair and keep them from sliding apart
Fits Lowe's standard replacement cushions except for back corner cushions

specs.title: Ottoman Dimensions (L x W x H)
Sofa Dimensions (W x D x H)
Loveseat Dimensions (W x D x H)
Coffee Table Dimensions (L x W x H)
Side Table Dimensions (L x W x H)
Chair Dimensions (W x D x H)

reviews.title: "legs rusted out after less than one year"
reviews.text: Owned chairs for less than a year and they are rusted out at the bottom. They are hnder a covered area and receive minor waterwhen it rains. No reason in my ipinion to rust like this. See photos.
reviews.author: chris

reviews.title: "great set but needs to be COVERED!"
reviews.text: We bought this set for use on an uncovered patio. I like the idea of being able to move it around and change configurations which you cannot do with most outdoor sectionals. Placing the order was easy and the items came all assembled which is a plus. Problem was the back most corner leg of the corner piece was broken in transit. I called and got a Garden Treasures rep who was just NOT interested in talking to me. She kept talking over me and insisted she knew what I wanted. Week later I get a connector piece in the mail which is NOT what I needed. Call again and speak to someone else. They understand what I need but tell me I will be getting a whole new corner seat. They don't have just the piece that fits into the leg. OK, that seems stupid. While waiting on piece the set is sitting outside in our thunderstorm weather in FL. It is starting to RUST. For an outdoor piece this is unacceptable. I had a set I sold sitting in the same place for 4 years that never rusted. I now have bought 2 covers to go over the set. Yesterday I received the new corner and it looks OK. Now I have to dispose of the broken one. Not sure what I'm going to do about the rust. Maybe polyurethane the pieces?
reviews.author: we3peas

reviews.title: "a bit pricey if not on sale but worth the cost"
reviews.text: This set is great  outdoor sectional. We are using it for our screen in porch. Its very comfortable and we have not had any issues since we purchased several months ago. We decided at the end of the season to purchase another for more seating.  Best feature to this set has to be how easily you can move around each chair. My one complaint is the original price  because we first purchased at the beginning of the season when it was not on sale.
reviews.author: Jimbo

reviews.title: "Super cute!"
reviews.text: We just received our sectional. It fits perfectly on our small deck. We also bought the ottoman. The color is great! It's a bit awkward attaching the cushions in the back if the sectional is against a wall or railing, it's difficult to loop and fasten the Velcro tabs.
reviews.author: Suzy

reviews.title: "Perfect set times two!"
reviews.text: I bought two of these and arranged it around our fire pit. It is the perfect size for our covered pergola area. I love the flexibility of moving the chairs around! People can't believe we paid less than $800 for the two sets! I'm happy I purchased! I also bought two sofa and two love seat covers and they fit great!
reviews.author: Jgrig15

reviews.title: "Is it designed for outside or not!"
reviews.text: I was under the assumption that this set was designed for outsideuse being a UV protected frabric and called patio furniture but the instructions say store in a clean dry place out of sunlight! The fabric soaks up water like a sponge so needs a coating like 303 fabric protector. my local lowes salesman said these are designed for outside and that cusions can be left on the seats. I purchased 3 of them to setup around 2 fire pit tables but im now worried about the life span of these seats after reading reviews of rusting frames and moldy cushions.Is rust and mold covered under the warranty! Who knows.
reviews.author: Brekfst

reviews.title: "It was SO perfect we bought two!"
reviews.text: I recently completed an Interior Design project for a Client's new home in Arizona.  In one part of her back yard was an existing concrete pad surrounded by a decorative wood railing.  My Client was at a loss on what to do with the space.  After researching options I purchased one set to anchor the seating space.  It promptly arrived and when I set it up in the space, we were both pleasantly surprised at the quality and flexibility of the 5-piece set!  After presenting my design to my Client, I immediately ordered ANOTHER set!   We both are TRULY satisfied with the quality of the product and the service of Lowes!
reviews.author: Lyn

reviews.title: "Perfect Set!"
reviews.text: We are going on our 3rd summer with this set. It looks high end and expensive and is worth the full price cost; even better is getting it on sale.  Assembly was a little challenging with pre drilled holes misaligned. But customer service was EXCELLENT. They were responsive and shipped replacement pieces without a fuss or any additional costs. Reading other reviews I was shocked that people would expose their set to the elements and then expect nothing to happen to it. We keep our set covered daily when not in use and bring it indoors during the winter months. We also treated the legs with wax to prevent rust and spray annually with UV and rain protectant.  Our set still looks brand new out of the box. We highly recommend this set and will be purchasing 2 ottomans this year to complete the look.
reviews.author: Candie

reviews.title: "Like the set-get the extra ottomans!"
reviews.text: Bought this set plus 2 extra ottomans 4th of July 2016 and got the extra 10% veteran discount(had my DD214 with me). Live in MD so the cushions are in a storage box for the winter and when wind/heavy rain is called for. Use it on an 11x11 condo balcony and it's a perfect fit. Bought 2 extra matching ottomams (talk to Dept. sales rep in store)to lengthen one side and to have a coffee table/foot rest. Quality is OK and I don't understand one star rating seam splitting comments. We have seen none of that. Our set is in the shade so maybe there's a UV problem with the stitching (fabric supposed to be UV protected). Seat cushions are a little thin for a big person after a while. All in all, a good set for our needs.
reviews.author: BigGuy

reviews.title: "Good Purchase if used for Covered Porch"
reviews.text: I purchased this set last year and have been happy with it.  However, I was warned about rust dripping onto flooring if used outside without cover.  Since mine is on a screened-in, covered porch I have had no rust issues.  The connectors do not work well as they are plastic so we removed them and bought super strong velcro strips and wrapped those around each pair of chair legs and that works great!  I think this price point is in-line with the quality of this sectional.
reviews.author: Buckeyegirl

reviews.title: "Great Outdoor Set"
reviews.text: Bought two (yes two) of these for out grill patio/10x13 gazebo. It is absolutely perfect. Fits the space extremely well. Comfortable and setup is really easy. Can't be happier...
reviews.author: JP

reviews.title: "Great"
reviews.text: Not sure why this is extremely low rated, but these are beautiful. I'm sure if the set is exposed to weather effects it will be damaged. It is nicely sized, stylish, and comfortable. I have our set in a slightly closed area on our deck.
reviews.author: Gg667

reviews.title: "So comfortable!"
reviews.text: We bought this sectional to sit under our Allen & Roth Canopy, which we also purchased from Lowe's. It was very easy to assemble.  We have had no issues with rust, however, it does not really get that wet under our canopy and we store it indoors over the winter.  My main hope for this sectional was for it to be very comfortable and that the cushions were not cheap and thin. They are thick, firm, and very comfortable.  In fact, my husband and I take naps on it and the kids can never find us (I mean, who takes naps outside?!)  The fabric also cleans up very well with soap and water should you have any spills (which we did).  I would highly recommend this to anyone.  I believe that the cushions alone are worth the cost of the entire item.
reviews.author: 3BEEMOM

reviews.title: "very nice"
reviews.text: One i got it home it was easy to assemble except one chair. The cushion straps are hard to strap on because the chairs are so close together. Overall very nice. Unfortunantly i cannot find a cover for it anywhere yet
reviews.author: sara

reviews.title: "Terrible purchase - Rust everywhere :("
reviews.text: Do not buy! Looks like a good deal but has costed us more. The bases all rusted causing damage to many expensive items - outdoor rug, Birkenstock sandals, clothes, pillows, our deck. We had to replace it and still need to replace the items ruined.
reviews.author: Pam

reviews.title: "Comfortable, But Damaged"
reviews.text: This sectional is very comfortable and easy to assemble. However, I had three issues right out of the box: one cushion was torn in the center, so it's flipped over for now; another cushion was torn at the seam and is also flipped over; and one of the chair feet was missing, so I couldn't attach the legs together with the provided hardware.
reviews.author: Rachael

reviews.title: "Love the design, fabric molded within a month"
reviews.text: We bought this at the end of fall to put on a covered and screened patio in Virginia with a ceiling fan. The fabric began to mold almost immediately. Not happy with this product at all.
reviews.author: Albussiere

reviews.title: "Buyer Beware"
reviews.text: This set looked great after purchase but by the end of the first summer of use, the cushions were beginning to mildew and the fabric felt very rough. As many others have said, if allowed to get wet, rusty water pours out of the frame and will stain concrete. We stored the cushions after the weather turned cool. The second summer the cushions were absolutely terrible, faded, rough, mildewed and torn, so we had to throw them out. Now I have to try to find some sort of replacement cushions which will undoubtedly be expensive. Such a disappointment.
reviews.author: Julesg72

reviews.title: "Love it!"
reviews.text: We are so in love with this set! It is stunning and was so easy to put together! I love how you can rearrange it how you want.
reviews.author: Alicia

reviews.title: "Easy & Efficient"
reviews.text: After sitting on many different patio sets... this one takes the gold for comfort. Many other sets seemed to sit low, the height on this sectional is perfect. Assembly was super simple! I love that you are able to adjust the set up of the sectional. The cushions seem durable and easy to keep clean. Would highly recommend.
reviews.author: Sara

reviews.title: "Perfect Patio Set"
reviews.text: I'm writing this review as I lounge on our new patio set, and couldn't be happier with this purchase! It took us less than 30 minutes to assemble and we were pleasantly surprised by how comfortable the cushions were. It comfortably sits 5 people and for us is the perfect size. Highly recommend!
reviews.author: TS

reviews.title: "Perfect on my deck!"
reviews.text: We purchased this for our deck and I just love it!  The pieces are easy to rearrange as needed, the cushions stay on with the velcro straps, and is is ready to use straight out of the (huge)box! I can change the colors just by adding pillows!  We have even placed a dining table with it for entertaining and it works just fine.  My only regret is not buying it sooner.
reviews.author: Sheri

reviews.title: "Rusty Water Pouring Out"
reviews.text: The set looks really nice and is quite comfortable. On the outside, it does not appear to rust. But, once it is lifted up, rusty water pours out from the legs and leaves large stains on the patio. Would not recommend this for use on an uncovered patio where it will be exposed to the elements.
reviews.author: Donotlikerust

reviews.title: "Practical and Versitile Patio Set"
reviews.text: I love the versatility of this set. It can be arranged and rearranged to accommodate seating needs. It is durable and easy to clean. It's stain resistant. I love the neutral color. My only complaint is that the feet used to level it on uneaven surfaces can get bent and it becomes wobbly, so it must be readjusted. Other than that it's a great set for the price.
reviews.author: mbg

reviews.title: "Love, love, love!"
reviews.text: All you have to do is unpack and set up where you want! Fits beautifully around my fire pit. I love the idea of being able to separate the seating if needing extra elbow room for groups. I really like the idea of the plastic adjustable height feet. No rust! Most of all, I'm looking forward to naps and relaxation on this. Super comfortable and plenty of loung room!
reviews.author: Cwalker

reviews.title: "Nice conversation set"
reviews.text: This is a nice conversation set, the cushions are holding up so far. They are nice and thick with a little firmness. It's all put together which was a huge plus. There's several ways you can arrange it. We cover ours at night so we haven't had any rust issues. We purchased the tables and extra chairs from Lowe's to complete the area.
reviews.author: Cj

reviews.title: "Wonderful set"
reviews.text: I searched through many sites to find just what I wanted.  Since this was going on my back porch which is elevated, I preferred a sectional - lighter pieces to move when needed. I started looking for a smaller set as I was only looking for a loveseat/sofa size.  The price, reviews and ultimate quality was a great choice.  There really is no assembly (assembly being the biggest problem I noted in reviews of many other sets.). I have two seat actions more than I need for very happy!less money and can use them as extra unattached seating.  The cushions are super comfy and if you attach them before connecting the seats it works very well.  It took me longer to break down the box than to put everything together!
reviews.author: VB

reviews.title: "A Definite Buy"
reviews.text: We bought this sectional about 2yrs ago. I admit the assembly was difficult and at one point my husband was ready to send it back. However, once built it is a beautiful sectional for our small back patio. We live in Miami, Fl which is mostly monsoon weather between Aug amd October and it has held up; we keep it covered with a protective liner, but admit the legs do get wet and flooded with water...no rusting.  During Hurricane Irma we brought it inside and used it as an extra sleeping bed  amd sofa where people could could sleep and wait until the storm passed. Great buy!
reviews.author: 305Sunny

reviews.title: "Conversation group"
reviews.text: Each of the seats are separated which makes it easy to arrange to your own needs.  Very well made. The price was very good.
reviews.author: Judy

reviews.title: "So comfortable!"
reviews.text: I am in love with this set! Using in a 3 season porch so I'm not worried about the previous rusty water reviews. We've spent many hours enjoying a room we just never thought to enjoy. Had the set delivered with free shipping and it was all assembled and packaged with a protective metal frame within box. This never would've fit in my SUV either without opening box.
reviews.author: SJ98

reviews.title: "Mildewed after 3 months"
reviews.text: I purchased this less than 6 months ago and the cushions started mildewing within 3 months. I tried washing with soap but it will not come out. It is in a screened porch and doesn't get any sun or rain.  The cushions look about 10 years old after 6 months.
reviews.author: Tucker

reviews.title: "Easy to assemble and comfortable."
reviews.text: Packaged nicely with no scratches or damage. The box it comes in is very strong and durable. No tools required to assemble! It took me about 15 minutes to put it together. I had one person helping me to move it around during assembly but I don't think it would be too difficult to assemble by yourself. It's comfy, too! I recommend it! We weren't planning to use it right away so the image I posted still has the plastic on the cushion to help keep them clean!
reviews.author: Zman

reviews.title: "Sunroom chair"
reviews.text: The chair fits perfectly in our sunroom it was a bit hard to assemble and the fabric is kind of cheap supposedly stain resistant, but some water spilled on it and the stain is still there!
reviews.author: jgrom

reviews.title: "Great Sofa"
reviews.text: Comfortable and looks great on the deck. Cushions dry out well. Might be wise to buy a cushion storage box for when it rains.
reviews.author: Kyle

reviews.title: "worst set"
reviews.text: I thought this would be the perfect set because you can move around the pieces but shortly after getting the cushions started to lose shame and the seams completely opened up.. Now I have a set that looks absolutely terrible.. I dont recommend this at all.
reviews.author: southshoremom

reviews.title: "Great sectional for a great price!"
reviews.text: We bought 2 of these sectionals (connected them), bc we have a fairly large patio and wanted enough chairs to lie down on and stretch out. Couldn't beat this deal! No we have a lot of places to sit, and the outside area is so comfy! The cushions are straight, so if you're wanting a curvier back, this may not be the sectional for you. But we really like it! All we need now are a few pillows.
reviews.author: Dawn

reviews.title: "Comfortable and stylish"
reviews.text: I am so glad that I purchased this set! We have it set up in one big sectional around our firepit and it looks amazing and is so comfortable! We have dinner outside almost every night because of it! I also love that the chairs came assembled - all I had to do was put the connectors on the feet of the chairs to make it one large sectional and then throw the pillows on!
reviews.author: AJ

reviews.title: "Extremely comfortable and great looking!"
reviews.text: We looked for an outdoor furniture set that could comfortably seat at least 4 and withstand the heat of Vegas.  This piece easily accommodates 5 large adults and is easy to get up and down from.  So far we have noticed no materials drying out in the heat and expect to get several years out of this set.  I would like to see a choice in colors of the cushions -- tan is what comes in the box.  This can be remedied by purchasing additional cushions, but would have been nice for an option.  Overall a very good choice for sturdy outdoor furniture that looks great and is extremely comfortable.
reviews.author: Zick

reviews.title: "Awesome Outdoor Sofa"
reviews.text: We are super impressed with this outdoor sectional esp for the price! It comes prebuilt and all you have to do is join the feet with some tabs to keep it from sliding! It's very comfortable as well, spent about 2 hours on it outside the Frost day we bought it and I was never uncomfortable. Definitely a must have!
reviews.author: MRian

reviews.title: "Should have listened!"
reviews.text: Read all the reviews before purchasing about the cushions sliding around but thought the price was right so plunged ahead....big mistake!  The cushions slide way worse than others mentioned!  It looks great but just don't sit on it...not exactly what I was going for.  Assembly was easy and I've had zero rust issues under a covered patio with slight weather hitting it.
reviews.author: Jen

reviews.title: "Furniture rust"
reviews.text: I have had this set for less than a month and I am already seeing rust spots and it is dripping on my brand new stamped concrete patio!!! Never will I buy this set again.
reviews.author: Jpfvd7

reviews.title: "Low Quality"
reviews.text: We bought this set a few years ago.  Well within a year it deteriorated even though it wasn't highly used.  The cushions tore at seams.  It also is quite light and moved around a lot.  I would spend more money and buy a quality set not a cheap one like this.Thanks
reviews.author: pete

reviews.title: "Great outdoor piece for the Money"
reviews.text: We purchased this for our back deck. It fits perfect in the nook we bought it for. It's very comfortable and I personally love the light cushions although with kids or pets they may get dirty easily. I Put scothguard on mine and so far so good!
reviews.author: Haley

reviews.title: "Great quality outdoor furniture"
reviews.text: We LOVE this couch, it separates so we can change up how we set up on our patio, we have changed it 3 times now, just because we can. It is comfortable, great quality and fits perfectly on my outdoor screened in porch.
reviews.author: Kaylee

reviews.title: "Really cute. Really a pain to connect w/o 2 ppl"
reviews.text: I'm all of 5'2” so...putting this baby together by myself wasn't the most brilliant idea that I've ever had. But it happened. It's done. I can't wait to drink coffee on it tomorrow morning!
reviews.author: NMva

reviews.title: "Great outdoor seating for a great price"
reviews.text: Bought two of these sectionals to create a large “U” shaped conversation set. Very comfortable and easy to connect together. They come assembled to just place the padding on and go.
reviews.author: Will

reviews.title: "GORGEOUS"
reviews.text: Love it!! Have been looking for the perfect sectional to place on the back deck. This sectional fits perfectly, looks amazing and the price is even better!
reviews.author: taylmic5

reviews.text: Loved it so much I bought 2, love the way I can change it around anyway I want.  I also don't like deep seating so this was perfect.
reviews.author: Adriana

reviews.title: "Rusty Water"
reviews.text: Multiple pieces have rusty water coming out of the legs not long after purchasing.  Very unhappy with this set. The cushions are comfortable but not easy to take off and put back on.  Not easy to keep the pieces together.
reviews.author: B

reviews.title: "Garden Treasures Steel Frame Patio set"
reviews.text: I saw this when I was shopping for patio furniture in the store. It looked nice and the price was right. I ordered it online and got it 2 days later. The delivery men were prompt and friendly. It came in one box, was packed well so there was no damage. It was simple to put together as it came preassembled. Seems like nice quality.  The cousins on the bottom attach to the frame, which is helpful so the do t move around or blow away. I love it, it fits beautifully on my deck.
reviews.author: Kim

reviews.title: "Outdoor living room"
reviews.text: My husband and I love our new sectional.  Fits perfectly on our patio.  Cushions very comfortable.  Even lice for an evening nap.
reviews.author: Chrys

reviews.title: "terrible cushions"
reviews.text: At first I loved the sectional and it was great, but then the cushions started to tear near the seams and they completely lost their shape..The set looks like it is 10 years old and it new.. I definitely dont recommend
reviews.author: Berns

reviews.title: "Nice set, but poor corrosion resistance"
reviews.text: I bought and installed this set for a new patio this spring.  The location is partially covered by a deck overhead but is exposed to blowing rain.  After only three weeks, we were finding rusty water trickling out from the legs of the chairs staining the new concrete.  I knew by buying outdoor furniture made of steel it would only be a matter of time before the effects of corrosion would appear, but I sure didn't expect it so see it in less than a month.  Even though we like the look and comfort of this set for our outdoor living area, I would not recommend leaving this furniture exposed to the elements unless it is in a fully sheltered room because of the inevitable rust.
reviews.author: milkmanchris

reviews.title: "Amazing deal for good quality"
reviews.text: I love our outdoor sectional! I was very impressed with the quality of the item and it's auper comfortable!!
reviews.author: Katie

reviews.title: "Simple and Classy."
reviews.text: Excellent quality, comfortable cushions. Exactly what I was looking for and at a great price.
reviews.author: Gjean

reviews.title: "So comfy!"
reviews.text: I love this sectional. Its versatile and can be moved into whatever configuration necessary.
reviews.author: Tiffany

reviews.title: "L shaped outside couch"
reviews.text: So comfortable! We love sitting outside on our new couch!
reviews.author: Kenya

reviews.title: "awesome"
reviews.text: Quick and easy to put together, very comfortable.
reviews.author: marvin

reviews.title: "Nice Sectional"
reviews.text: Easy to put together and very comfortable.
reviews.author: JST

reviews.title: "Very Nice And Durable Patio Set"
reviews.text: I purchased this patio set April 2017 for $598.00 when it was on sale and then the same set April 2019 for $398.00 which is even a better price. The set is very comfortable and looks very nice as well. I get so many compliments on this set especially when you pair it up with multi-color pillows. The Lowe's Stores in the surrounding area was selling out fast on these sets; I had to wait for an order that was coming from the Washington DC area with more of this patio set. Cookout time!!!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: DK1

reviews.title: "Outdoor sectional"
reviews.text: This sectional looks great, is comfortable and was a great price! I was pleasantly surprised to find out that all cushion covers have zippers for easy removal and cleanup!!!
reviews.author: Jworley

reviews.title: "Best Decision!"
reviews.text: Love, love, love! This is the perfect addition to our outdoor living area. Not only is the product itself super awesome (sturdy, interchangeable, aesthetically pleasing) but the customer service from the Lowe's employees was top notch! We placed our order online on a Saturday evening, received a call Sunday morning about delivery options and whether or not we wanted to it assembled upon delivery, by Wednesday morning at 10am we had our new sectional delivered and assembled! I would definitely (and already have) recommend this sectional piece to others!
reviews.author: Sam

reviews.title: "Happy with the purchase"
reviews.text: This set comes in a very large, 165 lb box so make sure you have the ability to transport it. We were very impressed with the packaging. The extra heavy cardboard box had a steel tubed frame to prevent damage and all components were wrapped or protected with plastic. Was easy to setup and the fact that the position of the pieces can be changed is a plus. Looking forward to enjoying it.
reviews.author: JimVino

reviews.title: "Great Set"
reviews.text: Chairs are sturdy, cushions are thick and conmortable, comes fully assembled but you have OPTIONS!!!  With the little leg attachments (included) you can have a number of configurations to suit your outdoor needs.  We like it so much we bought another set so we have even more options when the crowd comes over!  Great price, great product and it was delivered the very next day!  HIghly recomended A++
reviews.author: LadyBuilder

reviews.title: "Not bad for the price"
reviews.text: Easy to get in a hurry for guests coming in a few weeks. Packaging was not good as I refused damaged product, boxes we not packaged well. Second set was fine ended up buying 3 sets.
reviews.author: Bowbri

reviews.title: "Poor quality for cushions"
reviews.text: Cushions absorb a ton of water and take forever to dry out. Some had rips after one season. You cannot buy replacement cushions that fit this sectional from Lowe's or from the manufacturer. Would not buy again.
reviews.author: Megan

reviews.title: "Great piece"
reviews.text: This is just what we were looking for.  It is sturdy and comfortable and is the perfect addition to our covered deck.  My only issue with it is that the cushions slide around a little and the strap with velcro holding them on seems very flimsy and will likely tear.  I am happy that the covers zip off- you don't see that very often!
reviews.author: Janelle

reviews.title: "Nice set affordable price"
reviews.text: This is a nice set, we loved that it's configuable to place the pieces in different ways. The cushion color is light beige so goes with everything. It's comfy! I can see that the quality of the fill on the cushion may break down in time... but good excuse to get new ones and change it up! No cushions stay perfect anyway.
reviews.author: JB

reviews.title: "Hopeful"
reviews.text: The packaging was amazing. The metal frame around the perimeter of the interior of the box made sure the contents were very well taken care of in shipping. The big concern right now is the very negative reviews regarding a single season use of the cushions in particular. I'm really hoping that the cushions, if stored indoors and not allowed to be rained on or heavy dew, will keep them in good shape for years. If after spending the money I have, and only getting a single seasons use, it will be very unsettling.
reviews.author: Steve

reviews.title: "Disappointed"
reviews.text: They say that it's water resistant.  NOT.   If you don't keep them covered and it rains, the cushions will fill up and retain the water.   So make sure you BUY the cover as well.    Knowing what I know now, I would have never had bought this set.
reviews.author: Ernie

reviews.title: "Love Our New Patio Furniture!"
reviews.text: We purchased this on clearance and I'm so glad we did.  We wanted something comfortable and yet heavy duty and this is both! I would highly recommend others to purchase a set like this.  The sales people who helped us were awesome too! We need more people like them!
reviews.author: Teresa

reviews.title: "Bad Quality Item"
reviews.text: This set does not meet our expectations.  We have one cushion that has completely ripped at the seam within a few months of owning it.  The fabric has faded quickly, I would expect more out of this product.  It has been rarely used and not in the sun.  Don't waste your money.
reviews.author: JenP

reviews.title: "Versatile"
reviews.text: I love this patio set. Each piece or chair can be used separate or put next to each other to make a couch. I have owned this for about a month and can say the cushions are firm but comfortable and dry out quickly. The only con is the color of the cushions being to light of a tan. Everything shows up on them but, they seem to clean up well.
reviews.author: Nlc4522

reviews.title: "great price for the quality!"
reviews.text: I love this little set. For the price, it is great quality, it looks and feels great. I great deal for anyone looking for a nice set at a good price
reviews.author: rada

reviews.title: "Ripped cushion covers"
reviews.text: Overall the comfort level and look of the furniture is great. Unfortunately 2 of the seat cushion covers were torn.
reviews.author: Jmill

reviews.title: "Love this set!"
reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: Sandy

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: BB

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: Keyso504

reviews.title: "Quality that Rivals Furniture Costing $3,000 & up."
reviews.text: Easy to assemble, this sturdy yet comfortable patio furniture offers an astounding value for the cost. We had it delivered and it arrived quickly and with no damage. We love the set and highly recommend it.
reviews.author: Steve

reviews.title: "Good Find"
reviews.text: I bought this patio set after reading the reviews. I found it a little complicated to put together as I initially was doing it alone and the middle portion was a little tricky. However, it was definitely worth the effort. It is sooooo comfortable and roomy. I'll fallen asleep on it several times already and I've only had it a few weeks. Also, It has been pretty rainy and windy lately and it is taking the elements very well.
reviews.author: Brina

reviews.title: "Comfortable and sturdy"
reviews.text: Love the patio set. We looked for years trying to find something that was good quality without being too expensive. Finally found it in this set, definitely worth the money.
reviews.author: Andy

reviews.title: "Looks good"
reviews.text: This sectional looks great, is very comfortable but water collects under the cushions in even a light sprinkle of rain.
reviews.author: Brogue

reviews.title: "Rusty Junk"
reviews.text: The legs pour rust after sort of rain.  Not for outdoor use.
reviews.author: WhaleWatcher

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: DK

reviews.title: "Nice Patio Set"
reviews.text: Purchased this set online with light assembly required. The only problem we had was that two of the leveler screws at the bottom of the legs fell in and made it impossible to join the sections together. We called Lowes and the chairs were promptly replaced. Great customer service.  Other than that, we are very happy with the set. Looks great and is quite comfortable.
reviews.author: Mike

reviews.title: "Average"
reviews.text: Average.  When I purchased item, it was around $400 (on sale). Putting the item together was a chore.  There are pieces that connect the legs together that will break or pop off. I ended up simply tie wrapping the legs together. Other than that, an average low cost item.
reviews.author: Tab

reviews.title: "Garden treasures 5 piece seating"
reviews.text: So far we love it, only have had it for a month but really like that you can pull it apart to create individual seating. Only concern is once the cushions are ruined the whole thing will need to be tossed because you cannot get replacements and they are not standard size
reviews.author: Vanessa

reviews.title: "Can't beat this set for the money"
reviews.text: Got this on sale and couldn't be happier.Read reviews that rain water will cause rust stains when it drains so we do not leave them outside and uncovered. Suggest storing the cusions when not using. Taking general care of this set will allow for years of outdoor use.
reviews.author: Brian

reviews.title: "Lovely set"
reviews.text: Other than the pillows being different sizes it's perfect!  I did not want to spend a fortune but wanted something for folks to sit on, kick back and relax.  We just added a huge deck and needed seats.  We like to host parties and eat outside!  We love it so far!!
reviews.author: Kimmyw

reviews.title: "Beautiful set"
reviews.text: We are very happy with the versatility of the seating.  We are happy with the construction and classy look of the furniture.  Our only negative point is it soaked up the heavy rain and took 3 days to dry out.  I'm am going to look for some waterproofing spray.
reviews.author: Lulu

reviews.title: "Not too fond of this product."
reviews.text: The connecting triangular pieces that hold two chairs side by side, doesn't work. The screws on each let broke.
reviews.author: Patiogirl

reviews.title: "Satisfied"
reviews.text: After a debacle at HomeDepot, I turned to Lowe's who not met my expectations but exceeded them. This item is so comfortable and was easy to assemble. It has rained several times and the item is withstanding the weather pretty well.
reviews.author: Trayolay

reviews.title: "Great Affordable Patio Set!"
reviews.text: We needed an affordable, decent quality patio sectional for pur covered patio abd couldnt be happier. Minimal assembly, it can be configured several ways to fit tour space and nice quality metal framing witb a neutral color cushion
reviews.author: Nikki

reviews.title: "Nice sectional for covered patio"
reviews.text: Sectional looks very nice and seems well made.  The cushions are nice but might not fare well outside, mine is in a covered patio.  I bought this during a holiday sale and got a great discount, but I wouldn't pay full price for it.
reviews.author: Bamwjj

reviews.title: "Bummed"
reviews.text: Well we purchased on 4/4/19 . It is  in our screened in Deck . Looked amazing. After a short bit we found what we assumed was a spot from our children . took off cleaned found thousand of strands inside the cushions. Then realized it is the product coming apart . all seems are close to coming apart and some are . the spot is mildew / mold and from the looks of it. it is all over most of it . So to say the least even on sale Your spending bad money. Id rather spend a grand than waste $600.00
reviews.author: Eric

reviews.title: "Perfect small patio seating set"
reviews.text: We have a small patio on golf course and wanted extra seating, this fit the bill perfectly. Comfortable and versatile since the pieces can be used as a total system or as individual pieces.
reviews.author: Golfergramps

reviews.title: "Worth it"
reviews.text: We picked this couch due to the affordability and comfort. The cushions are super comfortable and it's nice because they come with a Velcro loop to keep them attached to the frame.
reviews.author: Liv

reviews.title: "Great Quality!"
reviews.text: We are loving our outdoor sectional. The quality is amazing for the price and it's very comfortable. Top cushions tend to fall over when it's windy but not a big deal to us.
reviews.author: Whit

reviews.title: "New deck furniture"
reviews.text: Product was a great deal. We need to replace our deck furniture and wanted something cozy but sturdier.  Minimal assembly required, we're absolutely happy with the set.
reviews.author: DCMikeyB

reviews.title: "Great for small space"
reviews.text: I bought this for our small covered patio area and it fits perfectly. It gives my outdoor space a clean and classy look. I accented with a few colorful pillows.
reviews.author: OutdoorMom

reviews.title: "Perfect!"
reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for my patio! Cushions are great with the weather and comfortable. The overall size of the set I perfect. Definitely a great purchase
reviews.author: J

reviews.title: "Nice set for the price"
reviews.text: Comfortable - good price - It is under  a gazebo so not sure how it would withstand the rain.  There should be Velcro on top cushions  not just bottom.
reviews.author: Cat

reviews.title: "Nice set"
reviews.text: Nice set. Comfortable. Looks great on it deck. Wish it had a way to attach the cushions so they weren't blowing over or off completely in the wind.
reviews.author: Bug

reviews.title: "Works great"
reviews.text: It's think cushions and comfortable. I have it on a covered patio, so gets a little rain but not much and seems to work great! Easy assembly.
reviews.author: Matt

reviews.title: "Great Piece for the Price"
reviews.text: Comfy, easy to clean cushions.  We arranged ours in an L shape rather than the picture shown and love it.  Fits perfectly on our back patio!
reviews.author: LTyson

reviews.title: "Garden Treasures 100 stars"
reviews.text: Looked for nine months for a well made and great price on the sectional I wanted. Couldn't ask for any better. Perfect color beautiful.
reviews.author: Lola

reviews.title: "Decent chair set"
reviews.text: Decent set for the price. Came assembled but not a huge fan of how they connect the units but it does work and overall a nice set.
reviews.author: Alpha1miller

reviews.title: "Patio Set"
reviews.text: It's amazing but make sure you have a truck. Had to take it out the box and tetris my suv. Had and awesome Vet who helped and all.
reviews.author: Tamara

reviews.title: "Good value"
reviews.text: Like the sectional option so we could adjust to the room. Not heavy, but sturdy to date. Comfortable and came fully assembled.
reviews.author: DAD

reviews.title: "Perfect piece"
reviews.text: We love this set on our screened-in porch. Love the feature that the chairs may be connected together, and it's comfortable.
reviews.author: Amanda

reviews.title: "Great patio set"
reviews.text: Really enjoy the versatility of being able to set up the set in numerous ways.... works excellent for a smaller deck patio.
reviews.author: GregF

reviews.title: "Nice and comfortable"
reviews.text: This set is comfortable and was easy to put together. The bottom cushions secure to the bench but the top cushions do not.
reviews.author: Kris

reviews.title: "Finally"
reviews.text: I wanted to purchase this set last year but didn't -my husband purchased this for me for my birthday-I am thrilled-love it
reviews.author: Annie

reviews.title: "Nice but too large for small deck"
reviews.text: Seemed like good quality but had to return since it wouldn't fit on our small townhome patio. Would've kept it if it fit
reviews.author: Theresa

reviews.title: "Great purchase"
reviews.text: Very comfy and was delivered without any issues. The set up took probably 20 minutes. Glad I bought it!
reviews.author: Sarah

reviews.title: "Great Patio Set"
reviews.text: It's a really nice patio ser for the price and I like how the cushions are attached to the chairs.
reviews.author: Amflor

reviews.title: "Great Value!"
reviews.text: I love the fact that you can set up in so many different ways. Great price and duper confortable.
reviews.author: Rocko

reviews.title: "Great product"
reviews.text: We love this, easily configured and we purchased 2 sets to make a very large sitting area.
reviews.author: Jerry

reviews.title: "Outdoor sectional"
reviews.text: Well built, sturdy and the cushions are very comfortable.Great sectional for the price.
reviews.author: Tony

reviews.text: I love the versatility of this outdoor sectional. Very high quality for the price.
reviews.author: Nandol

reviews.title: "Great set!"
reviews.text: Very comfy and fits my deck perfectly as you can rearrange the seats how you want!
reviews.author: Kann

reviews.title: "Patio Set"
reviews.text: Well made, cushions are thick and very comfortable! Great addition to our patio.
reviews.author: Heather

reviews.title: "Quality"
reviews.text: Set came packaged very well. Easy to connect sections. Great customer service.
reviews.author: NHart

reviews.title: "Just as depicted"
reviews.text: Compact and attractive.  The cushions feel well protected and are comfortable,
reviews.author: Mimi

reviews.text: Extremely easy to assemble. Great quality and thick cushions for outdoors!
reviews.author: Caitlyn

reviews.title: "Sectional"
reviews.text: We bought this while it was on sale. Exceptional quality and appearance.
reviews.author: Terrie

reviews.title: "Love it!"
reviews.text: It's perfect for a deck! It's very comfortable and easy to put together
reviews.author: Bean501

reviews.title: "Beautiful and came in fully assembled !!!!!!!"
reviews.text: Just took it out of the box and set it up.  Nice and sturdy too !!!
reviews.author: PatPat

reviews.title: "Patio"
reviews.text: We love this. Fits what we need. Comfortable. We did scotchguard it
reviews.author: Bill

reviews.text: Great sturdy patio set ! purchased on sale so even better deal!
reviews.author: Griff

reviews.title: "Easy to assemble"
reviews.text: Item thus far is good quality. Interested to see the longevity.
reviews.author: JCDavis

reviews.title: "Great deal!"
reviews.text: Took advantage of Spring Black Friday... great deal
reviews.author: Kielbasa

reviews.title: "Patio Set"
reviews.text: This patio set is a fantastic addition to my deck.
reviews.author: Erin

reviews.author: Heather

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: JoMamma

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: Daniel

reviews.title: "Great sturdy set...early review though"
reviews.text: The patio set was ridiculously easy to put together. The cardboard box that it was shipped in took more time to break down. The fabric looks nice and the metal frame seems to be heavy. We placed it in our screened in patio room down the beach. We do not have any place to store it over the winter time, so it will be open to the elements. I may buy some type of cover for it. I am hoping for the best. This spring we shall see how well it held up.
reviews.author: ajzerch

reviews.title: "Beautiful sectional Patio Furniture but....."
reviews.text: I saw this patio furniture online and I loved it. I thought it was all made of steel but it's not. The back and the sitting area is made of a material that will torn apart sooner rather than later because of the weather here in Florida. I placed them under my roof covered pergola. Don't get me wrong, the furniture looks amazing.
reviews.author: Olenka

reviews.title: "Very good quality"
reviews.text: I have two of these sets. They sit outside in the California desert heat. They have held up quite well. Two cushions got red wind spilled on them. We put club soda on the spills and then took the covers off (they zip) and put them in the washer with a little mild soap. Dried them outside. They came out perfectly.
reviews.author: rr

reviews.title: "Perfect choice for our outdoor "den"!"
reviews.text: Sturdy & comfortable! We love this sofa set. We have it in our partially finished, unheated garage. Its the perfect lounging spot for everyone in "the man cave". Plenty of space to spread out! The cushions are also nice and thick! We appreciate the quality for the great price! Delivery and setup were also easy!
reviews.author: Trish8

reviews.title: "Buyer Beware!!"
reviews.text: We put this set together on May 27th and it is June 20th and it has mildew stains all over it.  It has been under our covered patio completely out of the weather.  It doesn't get wet but still looks like it is 10 years old. Called the manufacturer and they say this is not covered by the 1 year warranty.
reviews.author: AmyC

reviews.title: "Nice.  But cushions take long to dry"
reviews.text: I just bought this set.  I love it.  But after a rain.    The cushions take forever to dry out.  The top looks and feels dry.  But if you sit on it.  The water comes right up from the bottoms of the pillows if not all the way dry.  So now if I know it's goi g to rain.  I will take them in
reviews.author: Andrew

reviews.title: "very comfy, looks great"
reviews.text: a little weird connecting the individual seats to each other but not a big deal.  delivered on time, one cushion was damaged upon delivery but we took it back to our local lowes and they replaced it no problem.  overall, very happy with our new corner conversation set.
reviews.author: Mike

reviews.title: "Patio furniture set"
reviews.text: Bought these to use at our place at the lake. They are sturdy and the cushions come off for storage when we are not there. The cushions on the bottom Velcro to the back of the chair to hold them in place. Love how you can configure them to whatever set up you want!
reviews.author: Heather

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: JP

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: Derek

reviews.title: "Love my Patio Set"
reviews.text: I love the patio set. It is so comfy and roomy. And it is easy to move. I love reading out on my deck. I spend 'Karen Time' on the deck in the fresh air and sunshine.  When my friends come over, they love to sit outside too.
reviews.author: Karen

reviews.title: "Excellent"
reviews.text: I love my new patio couch! Not to mention it was delivered free to my door and I got it the very next day! Super happy with the delivery service super happy with my couch it's exactly what I thought it was going to be.
reviews.author: Fuzz

reviews.title: "Beautiful"
reviews.text: What a beautiful lounge set.. The fabric on it is lovely and feels very comfortable. Perfect size for 2-5 people. Having the armless ends gives more movement. Also allows for a few different seating arrangements.
reviews.author: Jacquelinek22

reviews.text: Very comfortable, looks great with colorful throw pillows and our new propane fireplace placed in front like a coffee table.  Very reasonably priced and we are very happy with this purchase.
reviews.author: Virginia

reviews.text: Very comfortable, looks great with colorful throw pillows and our new propane fireplace placed in front like a coffee table.  Very reasonably priced and we are very happy with this purchase.
reviews.author: Virginia

reviews.title: "Great patio seating"
reviews.text: Lowes had these on special so we took advantage. I am very glad we did, they are sturdy and seem like they will last a while outdoors in florida. The colors are great and so is the fabric.
reviews.author: Garciajorgej

reviews.title: "More flexible than it looks"
reviews.text: It is 5 parts. The "L" and 4 chairs. It comes with locks so, if you choose you can secure the chairs to the L as shown, or spread the chairs out or make one side shorter or longer.
reviews.author: R

reviews.title: "Love this set!"
reviews.text: We love this set. My kids want to eat breakfast outside every day! I needed a new cushion so I called the company. They sent me a new cushion no questions asked! So Happy!
reviews.author: Sara

reviews.title: "Easy to assemble, looks neat"
reviews.text: I have seen other furnitures in this price range and can tell you that other cushions are not as firm and in-shape as this. Very easy to assemble, light weight and sturdy.
reviews.author: Omaha

reviews.title: "Greenway five piece set"
reviews.text: The set replaces the  Palm garden set much nicer re-design better cushions better frames on the chairs we actually purchased two sets and they are wonderful.
reviews.author: Rickettsresort

reviews.title: "Comfortable patio set"
reviews.text: This set was delivered the day after we ordered it! It was packaged so that nothing inside would get a dent. It's comfortable and looks amazing on our deck.
reviews.author: Christine

reviews.title: "Very nice"
reviews.text: Very comfortable sofa. My only recommendation would be something to secure the back cushions to the frame. Otherwise it is great.
reviews.author: Kate

reviews.title: "Great Sectional"
reviews.text: This sectional is great looking and can be arranged and changed based on your space and the style you want and is comfortable!
reviews.author: Billt

reviews.text: This patio set is very comfortable and I love the ability to change the arrangement to fit my patio.  Very versatile
reviews.author: Snickers

reviews.title: "I bought 2 and made a huge sectional for my patio!"
reviews.text: Love, love, love this! I purchased 2 and made a huge sectional. I also scotchgarded the cushions. Very comfortable!
reviews.author: Carol

reviews.title: "Great set"
reviews.text: A great set. Much improved from the palm garden set. We have 2-  5 piece sets on our deck to make a nice area.
reviews.author: Rickettsresort

reviews.text: We love the fact that we can separate it. It gives the patio a better look. And its very comfortable
reviews.author: Drew52

reviews.title: "Relax!!!"
reviews.text: Was very impressed with delivery as well as with the actual item. It is perfect for our back patio!
reviews.author: TTHOBBS

reviews.title: "Great value"
reviews.text: No assembly required. Good quality frame and cushions. I like that they can be removed for washing.
reviews.author: Vickie

reviews.title: "Perfect for my screened in porch"
reviews.text: My favorite room in my house now has my favorite piece of furniture. It's perfect and affordable!
reviews.author: Po

reviews.title: "Great Cushions"
reviews.text: We've bought countless couches. Price and quality you can't beat at this price point.
reviews.author: Jhare

reviews.title: "Perfect 5 piece patio set"
reviews.text: I love my new patio set! It was easy to unbox and able to start using it right away.
reviews.author: Tracey

reviews.title: "Nice set"
reviews.text: This is a nice patio set for the money.  Comes pre assembled which was nice
reviews.author: Haley

reviews.title: "Looks great"
reviews.text: Looks great fit together nicely very appropriate for my back porch
reviews.author: Woody

reviews.title: "Patio Set"
reviews.text: Well built frames, no assembly required. Good value.

questions.question: "Are replacement cushions available for this set?"
questions.author: Mike

answers.author: Francisco
answers.text: Well lets just say i called the customer service number, im totally disappointed on this item. i will definitely be canceling my credit card from there.YOU CANT BUY THE CUSHIONS OR THE COVERS....

answers.author: Des
answers.text: Nope I called the garden Treasures vendor number and they told me they used to sell replacement cushions but they were selling to many and didn't have enough to cover warranty replacements so they stopped selling the cushions. Just goes the show you how crappy this set is.

answers.author: Mel
answers.text: No, they will only replace them if they're under warranty. They would not allow me to purchase replacement cushions which makes the set useless since it is impossible to find cushions that size. Highly disappointed.

answers.author: anonymous
answers.text: I called the number provided. My set is a little older, but looks exactly like this one. They referred me to a Lowe's Sales number. I am currently on Lowe's chat hoping for an answer

answers.author: Product Manufacturer
answers.text: We look forward to assisting you with this matter. Please feel free to call our direct line at 800-643-0067 for part availability. Hours of operation are Monday-Friday 8:30a.m. to 5:00p.m. PST

questions.question: "do cushion covers zip off for washing?"
questions.author: SV

answers.author: rr
answers.text: Yes, they have zippers. I laundered two of the bottom cushions that had red wine on them. They cleaned up perfectly. I used permanent press washer cycle and did not use the drier. They air dried outside. Did not shrink. Wine stain disappears. Can't tell the difference between the two I washed and the others.

answers.author: Product Manufacturer
answers.text: Yes, they do have zippers but cannot be laundered. Mild soap and water should be used to remove stains.

answers.author: Readthemanual
answers.text: My patio cushion set came with zippered cushion covers that could be removed!!!!

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: No, they do not zip off.

questions.question: "Can I buy 1 more piece with cushons somewhere?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Cj
answers.text: Yes. 2 chairs for $391 on the Lowe's site

answers.author: Product Manufacturer
answers.text: Thank you for your question. Individual pieces are not available separately.

answers.author: Product Manufacturer
answers.text: The Greenway 5-piece Steel Frame Patio Conversation Set pieces are not sold individually.

answers.author: Product Manufacturer
answers.text: The weight capacity of the chairs is 250 lbs. each. The weight capacity of each loveseat weight is 500 lbs.

answers.author: Readthemanual
answers.text: Wt limit of individual seats of 300 Ibs is false and caution should be used in relying on Q&A section to make a purchase decision. The manual contained within the patio furniture set (item #0874965; model #FRS60638) states in capital letters that the MAXIMUM WEIGHT CAPACITY: 250 LBS PER CHAIR

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: The weight limit of the individual chairs is 300 lbs per seat and the couch is 700 lbs.

questions.question: "How water resistant or mildew resistant are the cushions? Would you suggest them being left outside?"
questions.author: Wazo

answers.author: Product Manufacturer
answers.text: The cushions are water resistant but not water proof. To prolong the life of your patio set, we suggest using protective patio furniture covers when not in use.

answers.author: MiaBella
answers.text: I didn't cover mine and now the cushions have a hard time drying out, like a week to get dry... they look awful now. The body of set is ok. But where to get cushions to fit the body that are weatherproof? Lot of money for a sub class set. Pretty upset that lowes has lowered its standards on merchandise. Don't leave uncovered!

answers.author: MaggieN
answers.text: We've left them outside a couple of times through rain and once through a snow storm. Gotta say they held up REALLY well. But I would certainly NOT leave them outside for the whole winter or summer either. Just saying that if you do forget about them and a storm comes, it is not a big deal...

questions.question: "what are the dimensions?? nothing is listed in the specs??"
questions.author: tfruth

answers.author: LM
answers.text: I had to cal another lowes to find it. 80in x 80in, 32in H x 26in W

answers.author: SFcustomer
answers.text: Note the dimensions listed in the specs ("Chair Dimensions (W x D x H) 24.00 x 30.75 x 32") do NOT apply to the corner "chair." We had a tight-fitting space to put this in, and luckily went to the store to measure and look at one in person. The corner chair is several inches wider, and that unfortunately meant this sectional didn't work for our deck.

answers.author: Anonymous
answers.text: We look forward to assisting you with this matter. Please feel free to call Lowe's Customer Service at (800)-643-0067. Hours of operation are 8:30 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. Pacific Standard Time.

answers.author: Mel
answers.text: No, they will only replace them if they're under warranty. They would not allow me to purchase replacement cushions which makes the set useless since it is impossible to find cushions that size. Highly disappointed.

answers.author: Product Manufacturer
answers.text: Please call 800-723-8836 to check availability and pricing.

answers.author: Laurie
answers.text: Can I buy one individual piece to extend my set?

answers.author: Product Manufacturer
answers.text: Thanks for your question, please contact your local store for patio cover availability. Please feel free to call our direct line at 800-643-0067 for any further assistance.

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: No, it does not come with a cover.

answers.author: Mel
answers.text: They did not allow me to purchase replacement cushions which makes the set useless since it is impossible to find cushions that size. Highly disappointed.

answers.author: Product Manufacturer
answers.text: We look forward to assisting you with this matter. Please feel free to call our direct line at 800-723-8836 for part availability. Hours of operation are Monday-Friday 8:30a.m. to 5:00p.m. PST.

questions.question: "Can the cushions be sprayed with a waterproofing spray? Would that help the mildew issue some have had?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Miki
answers.text: I would think a waterproofing spray would be helpful along with a cover to protect the set when not being used.

answers.author: Product Manufacturer
answers.text: For best results, clean the fabric with a damp cloth and dry thoroughly. This will help prevent mildew by removing dirt particles that may accumulate. Do not clean with abrasive materials, bleach, or solvents. Store the set in a dry, sheltered place when not in use.
